Package adrenaline.server

Interface LobbyAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Lobby, LobbyExportable
    public interface LobbyAPI
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The lobbyAPI, for action of lobby's state pattern.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • runAction

        java.lang.String runAction​(java.lang.String clientID)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        To do the run action request which received from client terminal
        Parameters:
        clientID - The id of client who did this request
        Returns:
        The result of this request to client
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • selectSettings

        java.lang.String selectSettings​(java.lang.String clientID,
                                java.lang.Integer mapID,
                                java.lang.Integer skulls)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        To do the select Settings action request which received from client terminal
        Parameters:
        clientID - The id of client who did this request
        mapID - The id of map which select from client from 1 to 4
        skulls - The skulls selected from client from 5 to 8
        Returns:
        The result of this request to client
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
